column5: We are a young, married couple with a four year old son who have lived here for the last 14 years. We've decorated the space to give an elegant, yet relaxed feel for the entire family. We have a formal dining space adjacent to our grand piano.  Further into the space is an open dining/living room and kitchen that is very large and perfect for gatherings and bringing everyone together in a relaxed setting.
column8: Perfect family home for super bowl weekend 2017
